name: Recreation of the Joy Division Album — VOL 1
description: After seeing all the abstract art I immediately thought of the album cover Unknown Pleasures by Peter Saville. It inspired this piece where I took the use of for loop to generate wavy lines with Perlin noice which change everytime you reload the webpage. The loops generate smooth, repeating curves on a black background with white strokes.

name: Recreation of the Joy Division Album — VOL 2
description: In VOL 2 I made another variation of the album. I added different colours, the strokes simulate ocean waves with a sandy beach background. To make it more realistic the waves are moving by using a framecount.
